channel.title: DAYLIGHT Coming In Early 2014
channel.description:
Seems like a combination of Amnesia-TDD and the recently released Outlast. Dilapidated and haunted hospitals are becoming quite popular.
Hopefully, "Daylight's procedurally generated levels ensures that no door, hallway, life-saving flare or clue to the main character's past are ever in the same place twice" will add to its replayability.
[url='https://www.bluesnews.com/s/147923/daylight-trailer']https://www.bluesnews.com/s/147923/daylight-trailer[/url]
